website_summaries.verdict: We are impressed with the warranties the manufacturer offers, but the overall looks of the fan are better than its performance.
pros: Modern build with rustic, rich brown blades that are weatherproof
cons: Some owners wish for better airflow, while others report that it tends to wobble after several months of use

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: This fan is listed as providing more than 5000 cfm of airflow and an energy efficiency in the 80's. It does not. In actuality it is just under 3600cfm at its highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described and exactly what I needed. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and exactly what I needed. I had to use a longer down rod with mine because I have vaulted ceilings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! It's very quite even on high. It doesn't wobble & it just looks fantastic in my house. It doesn't give off a lot of light but I didn't expect to with the small light bulbs & glass cover. I really bought it for the style & couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Matt&Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Modern look & circulates air well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks really modern! We got a wall switch which controls low, medium and high. I got the black and it fits great with my decor. The fan helps circulate air and has helped keep our house cool this summer. FYI the light bulbs it comes with are not dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: nataliejoyc

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars only because it is quite.
customer_reviews.text: This was the most asinine assembly/installation I have ever attempted on a ceiling fan. Just to mount/ attach the fan blades. Of course this after the you install the motor housing. You hold the fan blade over the light mount. Then you have to place your screwdriver thru a small hole on the light mount. Magnetic screw driver was most helpful. Other wise a few harsh words would be needed. Also, the cloth washers had to pressed on the bolt. I created a small press using some sockets. All I can say. Have fun and plan for it to take longer than expected. The good! It works flawlessly and is very quite.
customer_reviews.author: Tc99m

customer_reviews.title: Just okay, but looks good.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first remote fan I have ever bought and wish I would have done my research.... fail on my part! Things I like: It’s modern chic great for farmhouse It’s quit The lights are bright It’s a beautiful fan—- I guess this is why I kept it. Things I don’t like: The remote hates me—- it doesn’t do what I want it to. I’ve gave up on fixing it. If your couch swallows the remote you better find it because this fan has no back up plan aka strings. The things I don’t like are only two things but they are big big things.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Very good inexpensive fan
customer_reviews.text: I purchased based on a very favorable review on the Wirecutter site. Liked it enough to buy two more from Amazon and one from the local home improvement store. All 4 work well, barely wobble at high speed and were reasonably easy to install. We also have two expensive DC fans and they are much, much quieter. On low speed, expect slight motor noise. Switched the supplied light bulbs to LEDs. This is a very good fan at this price, just don't expect it to match up to a $600 DC fan in quietness, style and appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: would recommend
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these fans for our patio. We needed something that didn't hang too low as out patio has a lower ceiling. We had a hard time finding something for outdoor use in local stores so we took a chance and purchased these. They worked perfectly and even on high the motor is quiet! Only down fall is the way the lighting cover is attached, bugs are able to fly in but I do know that is a common issue with these types of products.
customer_reviews.author: ThisGirl

customer_reviews.title: Silent and bright!
customer_reviews.text: Really thrilled with this fan. Its totally silent with the flush mount. The light is great and the air it's pushing is perfect. Comes with like 10ft of extra wire if you really need it. Much better than the crappy one the previous owners installed!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lower ceilings
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, super tight to the ceiling. I needed ceiling fans with a light for standard 1950’s ceiling. I ordered 2 and installed 2. Very well built. Install is longer than others and may seem more difficult to someone who has no experience or little experience. It’s a fan that will last a very long time if installed properly. We use this brand for a lot of commercial and industrial location due to durability. Highly recommend for flush mount.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks’s family

customer_reviews.title: Wirecutter Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a house which had this fan installed in all of the bedrooms. I needed to add another ceiling fan so it was a no brainer to add another one. The Wirecutter selected this model as its recommended pick due to its quiet operation, performance, reliability and cost. The LED version is about the cost of an LED bulb above the non-LED model, so it's a no brainer to spend the extra money for this one as you'll never need to buy replacement bulbs and enjoy a (marginally) lower energy bill (depending on use case).
customer_reviews.author: R. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Westinghouse Comet Two-Light fan Very Quiet and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, modern looking, extremely quiet, well balanced and moves the amount of air needed to help make my bedroom comfortable. To me it is far better looking than those fans with three lights dangling from the bottom of the fan. Buy the best feature is the price when compared with the most popular fans. I intend to buy another soon. Why pay much more far a ceiling fan when this one does the job very well. It was easy to assemble if one reads the instructions and follows them. I can’t think of any reason for criticizing this fan and am awarding it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: James Butler

customer_reviews.title: Fan is highly rated, but be ready to put your back into assembly, installing it.
customer_reviews.text: I work with my hands for a living and am dexterous. The assembly and install of this fan might be taxing to many people. If you do not have patience and an ability to use your hands this fan might be difficult. Otherwise the fan performs as it should.
customer_reviews.author: john robinson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Despite three QC inspector's stickers, the upper metal housing plate for the light kit was cranked on at an angle to the motor housing and downshaft. The packaging was not damaged; the plate did not appear bent; rather, the hex nuts used to secure the plate to the shaft were cross-threaded. I could not loosen them to realign it so I sent it back. Also the screws holding the upper plates of the light housing were forced through crooked.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Great fan at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan! We bought two of these - one for our living room and one for our kitchen. While the light isn't as bright as we'd like for the kitchen (large kitchen and vaulted ceilings, so we bought a 24" down rod), we have enough under-cabinet lighting that it isn't a big deal. This would be easily solved by purchasing brighter LED lights, I'm sure. We have no issues with the fan being noisy or wobbling like other reviewers have complained about. I'd definitely recommend this sleek and modern ceiling fan!
customer_reviews.author: z1572

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but does not do its job. I added this fan in a small bedroom thinking it would cool the room down, I was wrong. Its disappointing to pay this money thinking it would do a job and it doesn’t cool the room at all. My husband seems to think the motor releases heat that makes the bedroom even hotter because when leaving the room it’s installed in, we notice a significant drop (cooler) in temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: I'm a big fan!
customer_reviews.text: Great fan, relatively easy to assemble, but sadly no remote (sold separately). For as big as it is, I wish the High setting was a bit higher but that's not saying it's not high enough. I just thought the size of the blades would create a small hurricane and they don't. Other than those things, I love it and am completely happy with my purchase. Also when you buy a remote, don't buy that weird round one with the buttons all arranged in a straight line. It's the worst remote in existence. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The pictures of this fan that are on Amazon are disguising. The fan on the pictures has a daylight bulb, when the fan arrived and I went through the whole installation( not easy) I found out after turning the light on that the bulb that came with it is soft white(yellow). The bulb on this fan is special. Won’t be easy to find it . I contacted customer service they told me they were on partying for a week and they would contact me. Literally.
customer_reviews.author: Marlo

customer_reviews.title: Alright great fan, pain in the ass to put together, crap light bulbs.....but....
customer_reviews.text: I really wrote this review to co-sign that the 40 watt bulbs that our included are not bright enough to light a bedroom, but I found some bulbs that were.  I swapped out two of these, and they fit with room, and its amazing, lights up the whole room. Now about the build, its a solid fan, but attaching the fan blades, and even attaching the blades to the arms is a pain. This fan easily takes an hour to put together and hang, and I'm good at this type of work, but looks great.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Works but not beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It does what it supposed to do, nice air. Wish I could have spend the extra $50-$100 bucks to get something that looks better but over all, it’s fine. Mine came bent but it was such a pain to put together I’m just leaving it as is. If it’s going in a living room or a place that is big and open, it’s not the prettiest to look at. You can see the rods in the inside and it’s very obvious against the black base and blades. Over all it’s fine but if your looking for beauty, this probably won’t satisfy you.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Four

customer_reviews.title: Good fan, especially for price.
customer_reviews.text: Fan is exactly how the other 50 fans I've put together.. no harder, no easier. Reviews that say otherwise.. well, not so sure about those people. Decently quiet, good airflow (12*12 room), not really using the light.. but it's pretty much on par with other fans w/ LEDs (about a 60w bulb). No remote.. but for the price it's an easy add. Great bedroom fan.
customer_reviews.author: rbw

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Buying this I wasn’t expecting a miracle fan.. but this thing is pretty awful. The blades are flat so doesn’t really push that much air. It shipped missing 2 screws. Does not come with a remote control so don’t know why there’s a rating for that? When the fan is on high, it makes random noises. Not really the motor or blades making noises but more of random creaks and pops. Nothing electrical but air of unsettling while this thing is spinning at Mach 1 above your skull.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Harden

customer_reviews.title: They are great no noise
customer_reviews.text: They are great no noise accept for air moving, only issue is why in the heck are there incandescent bulbs in the fan. The fans are well balanced they are rock solid on high, my last fan was a hunter and it had saggy blades and shook like mad. Very happy bought 2 for the porch and one for the den, all are quiet and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: bulldoglevin

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble and looks good but that doesn't help ...
customer_reviews.text: This fan does push exactly zero air. My 16" room fans push more air than this. I bought this based on someone that reviews fans professionally and given that it was supposed to push about north of 3000cfm went and pulled the trigger. It was very easy to assemble and looks good but that doesn't help if it doesn't perform. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: silverarrow

customer_reviews.title: A passable fan. Not great, not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I got this fan because it ranked high on an online listing of ceiling fans. It's been ok. It works adequately. It is definitely not silent. It makes noise that you don't generally notice until the room is quiet...like at bed time. Overall, it's OK but I wouldn't have ranked it as high as the list did. If I was buying today, I would get something different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Builder grade look
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. Ordered this for a home we’re remodeling & thought the style of this fan would look great. Instead it looks like a cheap builder grade fan you can buy for half the price. Then the light is TERRIBLE! You could barely tell we had it turned on. Yes we could buy new bulbs I guess, but why even include bulbs if they’re going to be that awful?
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, sharp looking and smooth. Fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Before buying these two fans I read the reviews. Good ones and bad ones. The bad ones some I found really amusing and kind of ridiculous. Just things people complain about. These fans are less than 100 dollars. They are excellent for the price. Quiet and smooth and sharp looking. My only disappointment is they don't come with the remote, but even with the chain they look great. I shortened them. Nice air flow and the light is dimmed. Not too bright. So isn't expect to light up a stadium. I recommend you pay for installation, unless you know what the hell you are doing. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Wavering Noise Drives Me Nuts
customer_reviews.text: Highly NOT recommended for bedroom. If you have a quiet bedroom, this fan is not for you. When turned on, it gives off this wavering motor noise sounding like, "yang! yang! yang!". My bedroom is fairly quiet. If I lived near the freeway or in a noisy city then perhaps I wouldn't notice as much. Other than the noise, the fan is pretty nice. It is modern looking and puts out excellent cooling.
customer_reviews.author: 85C

customer_reviews.title: Great fan but difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: The product looks nice, functions well, and is quite but it took forever to put together. The directions were very vague and left a lot of room for interpretation. Overall, I would not buy again because of the difficultly assembling. If that’s not a concern for you and you have about 3 hours for assembly, it’s a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great low profile, with a bit of style!
customer_reviews.text: Very slim design, little light kit, just that. A bit of foil and a baby bulb, but it does the job! Long wires, so VERY helpful on the install. Comes with a great mounting options! Two color options on the flip side of the blades, the other side was a bit much, but it's an option! I bought it so it would not be in the way of my projector. My original fan was like 18" this one is nothing compared to that, a real find! It's reversable, quiet, I'm a fan! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: testarossatd

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.  Assembly - meh
customer_reviews.text: Had a Hunter fan go out in a bedroom and replaced it with this. Once installed, it looks great and works wonderfully. Move a lot of air and is very quiet. The only thing I didn't like was the blade mount installation - the screws are the same thickness as the inner diameter of the cushion washers - they can't easily be pushed through, so you have to hold them in place and turn them through. The washers are thin, but sturdy, so this really, really hurts your fingers after the first few - really sucks after all five blades. Three screw-washer sets per blade. Other than that, installation was easy and the fan itself is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Decent for under $100
customer_reviews.text: The top of the light is not open backing so it cast a shadow across the ceiling limiting the amount of light output. It’s very bright in a concentrated area (center) but shadows the room’s outside perimeter in a small room. The shadowing isn’t too apparent in the image but it gives a slight understanding of what gets light. The glass should be bigger and refract against the ceiling in an open back to get the best light output. Also the bulbs get very hot due to its enclosed design. 3.75 ✨
customer_reviews.author: ĶÏĐĐ

customer_reviews.title: No air. Ticking sound.
customer_reviews.text: After a few minutes being on, the fan stopped producing airflow and creates a continuous ticking sound. Then, the sound disappears and the airflow comes back. It goes back and forth like this the whole time it is on... sigh.. of course, i threw away my old ceiling fan the day after i installed this......... now im stuck with this piece of *you know what*....
customer_reviews.author: Mdazmi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this fan
customer_reviews.text: I read the New York Times Wirecutter review for this fan. The review said it was the best ceiling fan. Well, I am totally disappointed in the amount of air that is blown around. The previous fan was great. The air wind was great. This new fan stinks but I do have a high ceiling. Hardly blows any air at all. I do have it on the correct setting for summer. I would NOT recommend this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: NICE, CONVENIENT, SMOOTH NOISE LEVEL
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Westinghouse ceiling fan.... Works perfect in my daughter's room. It's stylish in black color, and mine did not come with remote control but I have a wall switch that works for my fan so no problem..... Easy instructions for installation and energy efficient.... Like the subtle light...
customer_reviews.author: O. Mori

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan install is not easy and Westinghouse Lighting 7787000 remote beware of hell of install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan but the Westinghouse Lighting 7787000 remote does not fit inside of this that Amazon recommends, you have to literally rewire it into the ceiling which I did or magiver it. But other wise the fan works great. Looks awesome and is not loud and moves a lot of air. Have no complaints so far. But get a remote and yes the lights will dim if you buy a remote , not sure what will fit but inside of this fan but the remote does dim the lights by holding down the light button on the remote. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan. One of the best I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is super quiet, which is why we got it. It loses a lot of wind when it’s flush mounted. It was a b**** to put together because the fabric washers were so tight on the fittings. Have fun. Highly recommended end product if not flush mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Got compliments right away, even from the electricians
customer_reviews.text: Good looking fans! Nice, sleek and simple enough to blend into our eclectic decor. Love that one pull has the fan image and the other has the light bulb, but subtly. The bulbs that come with the fans don't put out a lot of light, but the light kit was just a little bonus for us anyway. Haven't tried brighter bulbs or even checked the recommended wattage yet. Fans also offer up/down direction for all year use. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: HeightsGirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Husband installed in a bit over an hour, with a little help from me. Was easy enough that he wants two more for the living room. At the highest speed it’s very quiet and moves a lot of air. The light is not the brightest, but it works. Overall, it turned out to be a really nice fan!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Really great fan for such a great price
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend help me install this fan which is definitely necessary. It's a two person job unless you have previous experience. I live near a highway and was actually looking forward to having a little white noise in the room from the fan. To my surprise this thing is completely silent! I guess that's not a bad problem to have. Fan is balanced out of the box. No need to use the included weights. Airflow is great! Highly recommend this fan!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: It's a good lookin fan especially for $100
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks great and is priced great. It's not the most solid fan out there, but you don't know it until you handle it... but who is handling their fan after installation?? Assembling the blades to the motor was a pain because the fabric washers are slightly smaller than the screws, so it took some effort to get them on. Once it was all up, it looks great, is low profile, and doesn't wobble or anything (didn't have to balance it either). The only thing I don't like is that the screws and chaings are not black, they're kind of a dark brass. Not sure why they didn't include black parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Strausberger

customer_reviews.title: Bought a half dozen they were so nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new house. Assembly took time but directions were excellent! Remote not included but easily added if you want. Runs quiet on all setting except the fastest, and even that's not too loud. Light is ok - don't expect to read under it. Wish the pull cords were a bit longer but they are nicely labeled fan or light so you know which is which.
customer_reviews.author: ~Anna~

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bang for the buck. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install. The mounting bracket has a hook to hang the fan motor on while you wire it. Mine even came with wire nuts too. Fan moves a good amount of air and the blades/rotating assembly are very well balanced out of the box. I didn’t have to use the included stick on weights to balance it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L

customer_reviews.title: Better options elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: The fan looks good but it gives off a very dim light so if you need it as the main light source for the room, don’t get this one. When the fan is turned on, it has an annoying hum to it. It was more complicated to install than some of the other fans we just recently put in our house, so we don’t feel like going through the hassle of taking it down and installing a different one. Ours didn’t come with the remote either. Too much trouble to package it back up and deal with returning it through the mail. Save yourself the trouble and buy a different fan somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: So glad i got this fan
customer_reviews.text: i mean any fan would be an improvement in my room but this one looks great and minimalist, installs pretty easily, and is fairly quiet. my ONLY complaint is that the red fiber washers it comes with are essentially useless. they don't seem to wanna go on to the bolts they're meant for and they're kinda brittle so forcing them on doesn't work. i just installed the blades without them and it seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Works well and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Functional. We've installed it on screened in back porch. Works off of 4 way in house fan switch. It actually replaces a 14 year old Westinghouse fan that worked but seen its day. Good value, and we like its look...quiet.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: and looks great! It took quite a while to assemble and ...
customer_reviews.text: It is so quiet, works well, and looks great! It took quite a while to assemble and install, but not too bad. This is a great value for the price. I'm very happy with this purchase and plan on buying more of these for our other rooms to replace some of the more traditional looking fans.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Bought It
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan. Good value. I'm amazed by those who said they had it up in minutes, took me several hours. Glad I tried it instead of paying several hundreds for a more expensive brand. The directions were adequate, but could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Poor Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very quite
customer_reviews.text: i like that this product is very attractive to look at, very easy to install and setup and runs very quite, the only problem is the light is not bright enough, but you can remedy that by getting a brighter LED bulb. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Quiet fan on all speeds
customer_reviews.text: I like that the fan blades screw connections to the motor are hidden between the top motor and the light unit below. I first didn't understand how to connect the fan blades to the unit until I looked underneath where the light unit connects and saw the wider opening (look from underneath) that if you rotate the motor you can access the screws. This is a quiet unit (I have a couple of more expensive Hunter models and this is just as quiet. I used LED candle light bulbs to replace the two 40w incandescent bulbs they provide (LED are 14w vs. 40w equivalent, but much higher brightness).
customer_reviews.author: Scott_W

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t include remote.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I’m taking away a star is because the image for this product showed that it did NOT have the pull tabs which would mean that this was a remote control fan. Apparently that isn’t so.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy. Too Dim. Motor Makes Noise. Has Pull Chains. Assembly Instructions are Terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Super unhappy with this purchase. Assembly was a pain in the butt - took me 4 hours (and I'm good at assembling things). I know it does mention the pull chains in the description, but not showing the ugly pull chains in the photo is misleading. The 2 included 40w incandescent bulbs are way too dim. Also, regardless of speed setting, the fan motor makes a buzzing noise that makes it unsuitable for a room where you're planning on watching TV. I honestly don't have anything good to say about this and wish I didn't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anthony Hornak

customer_reviews.title: Assembled and in the ceiling and doesn’t work!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell that this was purchased and then returned. Missing parts. Scratches & dents on many of the pieces. And the fan doesn’t work. It worked for about 20 seconds and hasn’t since. Looks great. Found out the hard way now that it’s already mounted. Any idea of who I need to contact to fix it or get a credit?
customer_reviews.author: K. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control receiver does not fit in this fan
customer_reviews.text: We totally love this fan - it is in a medium size bedroom and looks as well as works excellent. It sits flush against the ceiling. However, this review is to inform others that a REMOTE CONTROL RECEIVER DOES NOT FIT anywhere inside the fan unit in order to install a useable remote. This is the payoff for the unit sitting so flush against the ceiling. We are sad about this as we would prefer to use a remote. The light and fan still work great, you will simply need to turn it on/off and adjust the fan power manually with the chains.
customer_reviews.author: Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Fan is good. Assembly & Install Nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Like the fan. Assembly and install was beyond frustrating. The install would for sure make me not buy another I actually need three more fans and ordered this one to see if we liked it but the install was over two and a half hours. So we will be getting something different.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Fails after a few years
customer_reviews.text: I've had many ceiling fans for many years throughout my life, and I've never had issues with them before. I purchased two of these about 4 years back, and now one of them barely spins when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a low ceiling and it made a wonderful replacement for the one that was there. Fairly easy to install and the only sound I hear out of it is the air moving when the fan is on. My only issue are the stock lights are not bright at all. Since I'm against waste, I'll wait until at least one burns out, then I will get LEDs. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our fan installed for about two months now, and it's still quiet. Puts out a lot of air, and with the most flush option installed, it doesn't hang low on our 8-ft ceiling. Also, I spray painted the metal parts before I installed it, and they are still looking great. Love this fan!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan! I installed 2. They are nearly silent on the lower speeds and work great. They don’t have a remote and I hate the strings hanging down, but I can live with that. I had to have someone install it who knew what they were doing- it’s not for a novice. It does swing and make noise on the higher speed, but the lower speed is perfect. I gave it run most the day and it cools the house very well and I like circulated air. I’m super happy for the price and look.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Green

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect! We wanted something a little more modern for our living room and a fan that didn’t have super low exposed lightbulbs. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Works great/dim light
customer_reviews.text: Has good speed, light is pretty dim, could be pro or con depending on preference. We replaced the bulbs it came with with LED and it’s still pretty dim. Love the look/style/color.
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan, but a little dark
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking fan. Overall happy about the purchase. Didn’t realize before arrival that this product is not LED and has two little bulbs. Compared to our 3 light existing fixture, the lumens just aren’t comparable and this fixture is definitely lacking. I plan on replacing the little bulbs with LEDs to see if I can get a little more light.
customer_reviews.author: CMV

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fan for my garage and have been pleased with it so far. It wasn't too hard to install by myself with basic tools. Its fairly quiet and provides good air flow in both forward and reverse. It wobbles a bit on high speed but so does almost every other ceiling fan I've ever had. I found that using the mini spiral CFL bulbs provide better light and last longer then using the candalobra type which the instructions call for. But they must be mini spiral to allow the light cover to go back on. Not a fancy ceiling fan, but great value for a small bedroom, office or garage.
customer_reviews.author: Cornhusker

customer_reviews.title: Great fan - great instructions.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never installed a fan. I had to replace my old one because one of the cords got caught in the engine and wrecked it but this one was easy to put together and I got it working first try. The instructions however seem to be slightly out of order and so I had to undo and redo things several times. I highly recommend two people to install this fan.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This was not sent new. Half the screws are missing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this new and it came with the bags open and the box terribly re-wrapped. I had to go try to find the matching screws and washers from the store. I had someone come to install it as part of a larger project so I had to scramble. Watch out!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Peter Varbedian

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, and 3 out of 4 worked perfect!
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 worked perfect one needed some minor adjustments to work noise (grinding) free. Other than that they look great modern and work as expected hard wired to two separate switches one for light one for fan. Forget about wireless remotes which is one more to loose and having to change batteries...
customer_reviews.author: David Mercado

customer_reviews.title: Good Except...
customer_reviews.text: The fan is pretty much as expected except for the plate that holds the lowest portion of the assembly, the light fixture part, came bent crooked/bent. The rest of the fan is perfectly in line but the light fixture is crooked because of this. Now I have to either deal with it or uninstall and reinstall a replacement, which will take several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Dixon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Took my husband about an to install. The light is extremely bright, which was perfect because out living room is a bit dark. Overall, I am in love with the sleek and simple design.
customer_reviews.author: paula compton

customer_reviews.title: Good Airflow, Compact, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: TLDR/Recommendation: Buy it Fan feels great. Nice and compact for rooms with low ceilings and a great size vs price value. Energy efficiency rating is a definite plus. A little cumbersome to install, just like any other ceiling fan. Worked well with existing 2-switch box (fan and light controlled independently). Matches well with black furniture in room.
customer_reviews.author: whentheanimals

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, Sounds terrible
customer_reviews.text: we installed this and the motor is so loud. Even on low speeds it sounds like it's grinding something in the motor. Total waste. Next time I'll spend more money on a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We placed this in our living room about 3 weeks ago and it is so loud. It sounds like a jet in my house. I think it has a bad bearing. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, quiet
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, the light is a little dim as it's not an LED and only holds to bulbs, but I used it in a bedroom and it's great for that. Was simple to put together like most fans. Has two chains not shown in the picture
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great and the light was sufficient for what we needed. We purchased two of these fans to go in bedrooms that had no lights (other than lamps) so I was a bit concerned about some of the reviews saying the light on this fan wasn't that great. After having the fans installed, I was more than happy with the brightness of the light. Are there brighter lights on ceiling fans out there? Sure, but this one worked fine for me...and the fan looks great too! Completely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a few weeks now with no issues. For the price this is a great deal. No quality issues yet. I have not noticed any funny sounds or wobbles. I installed it with the remote kit and that works fine. On the highest speed it moves a ton of air. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fans
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these and just installed for our renovation project. They look great and appear to be very quiet. Happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Canuck68

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two
customer_reviews.text: Have had one for two years and it runs so smooth I ordered another last year; which is running like a charm. I plan on purchasing a third one. I definitely recommend this fan. It is a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Nearly silent and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: On all but the highest speeds it’s silent in my small office. I’m remarkably inexperienced with home repair, and I single-handedly installed the whole thing in roughly two hours. The included bulbs aren’t the greatest, but they’re easily-replaceable candelabra-style. It’s wonderfully effective and nearly invisible in its unobtrusiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Fan looks cheap in white, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: This fan isn't as great as the other reviews make it sound. I purchased it in white to blend in with my living room ceiling, and I have to say... the fan looks cheap. I only paid a little over $100, but I feel like it was wasted a bit now. Maybe it looks better in black, but I can't recommend the white. As for air flow, the fan is okay. Nothing exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: InTheLou

customer_reviews.title: Decent ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air, but I'm not a huge fan of the light they have on there. EDIT: if about a year in it start wobbling and squeaking take it apart and tighten the blade screws.
customer_reviews.author: ashton

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: Terrible instructions. Pieces labeled in the manual are not consistent with the pieces given. Missing steps throughout the manual. We ended up just ignoring most of the instructions and did it on our own. Solid fan once you figure out how to put it up.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: So much for "silent"... not.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed- the fan hadn't run two full hours before developing a once-per-revolution "click"- all speeds, in both directions. If this were in my bedroom, rather than in the office it would already be on the way back to Amazon... and might still go back, it's most annoying.
customer_reviews.author: E J Henderson

customer_reviews.title: incredible fan, incredible  value!!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing, and was worried the fan would be loud on high....I'm not sure what incredible type of fan the people who wrote they were noisy are comparing the noise to. these fans are very quiet on high, they work so well. I bought one, put it up, and ordered another that night. Slowly replacing 3 more fans with these. I searched everywhere for modern looking fans, good quality, enough brightnrss, etc...they were all well over 150, this fan is a steal at under 100!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I love how the fan looks but after instillation the light doesn't work. I was very disappointed. Lucky we have enough light in the room so I didn't bother to pull it back down and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: I Like It.
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace an overhead porch light and I saw a similar fan/light on HGTV. So I bought it and had it installed. I haven't had any problems with the light or fan. It has been so hot that the fan is a great addition to the porch. Also, it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks very nice. And also was super easy to install. It took me about an hour to do the flush mount because i didn't have any light and was doing it by a flash light. Directions were straight forward and easy to follow. Keeps room cool. Fan makes some noise on high, but I didn't expect it to be silent like a fan that is twice its price. The light that it gives off is also decent. Again for the price I think you get good looks, decent air flow and it isn't overbearingly loud.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing an earlier version of the same fan. I had hoped to be able to leave the wiring from the motor without having to remove everything. But the wiring harness was different. The old Indy had a nine pin connection. It was 6 for the new one. But the fan works very well. It is quiet. I don’t often use the lights.
customer_reviews.author: Follically Challenged

customer_reviews.title: Remote kit doesn't fit in the skirt
customer_reviews.text: fan looks and works great but I bought the remote kit bundled with it and it doesn't fit in the apron as it should. I ended up having to electrical tape it to the outside of the skirt. the remote also works great but someone should check compatibility f these items before bundling them together. i have an idea i am going to bequestioned abut my fix from anyone who sees it and I am going to see if I can hide the mess on the structure above. Would have been 5 stars except for this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: We love this fan! It blends into the ceiling without taking too much attention, but still lends a modern, neutral look. It is plenty powerful and creates a big, silent breeze. The light in the middle is just right. It was easy to install. You can install it as shown, or flush with the ceiling. For a whole article about how great this fan is, check out The Sweethome! [...]
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good the second time
customer_reviews.text: The first one was DOA, fan motor would not spin. Thanks to Amazon for an awesome return / exchange experience, we received the second one pretty quickly. Second fan installed as expected, and worked. However, one of the blades rubbed against the housing and had to be bent a little. After a little elbow grease the fan works and looks great, very smooth operation, moves a lot of air. Three stars, would've been two if not for Amazon and their awesome service.
customer_reviews.author: RyRyRyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Noise
customer_reviews.text: This product looks good, but it makes this humming noise and it is brand new out the box. I looked it up why it makes this noise and it states that it might be cheap bushing or bearing inside the fan. Would not recommend to purchase this product unless your going just for the look.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Do not plan to use with Insteon FanLinc.
customer_reviews.text: An FYI for Insteon users. The Insteon FanLinc module is not compatible with this fan. Specifically when the fan is on low and the light is on, there is a loud hum. Confirmed with 3 FanLincs and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fan - great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be happier with this fan! I had it installed by a professional, which took him 10 minutes, so I would disagree with the reviews that say that it's hard to assemble. If you are not an expert in this, it will take you some time..the fan is really well balanced! It pushes a lot of air and doesn't wobble or make any disturbing noise! I am very satisfied and will be ordering another one very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True black.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. It is true black which was hard to find. Didn’t want to spend a lot for the extra bedrooms and these worked perfectly. They circulate a lot of air and are pretty quiet while doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchninja

customer_reviews.title: Well worth what you paid....great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan silent as the dead and move some pretty good air. I would have gave it five stars except trying to put the screws on with the fan blades in that little slot sucked LOL. Other than that great product! And for a hundred bucks you can't go wrong especially for the more modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny S.

customer_reviews.title: Tough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Pretty tough to out together. Has no remote. Built in LEDs are only ok at best. But it was also cheap so, that being said it's a good looking fan.
customer_reviews.author: Shoots farther

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great buy I love it blows great! Going to buy another one for my bedroom did not come with extender
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: No Vibration and NO Noise - Runs smooth as can be. Great value - Relatively easy installation - our old fans were controlled by 2 wall switches - the wiring was an easy installation
customer_reviews.author: Mr A C Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan but all the bolts come loose over time.
customer_reviews.text: This fan looks nice and pushes a good amount of air but every couple of months i have to re tighten the bolts holding the blades on because it starts to tick and gets really noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and good looking too . No noise , very sturdy and love how it looks in my living room . The light is great too . Not too bright or dim
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and great addition to our gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This went together easily, attached an extension rod and fitted it to our new gazebo - it is excellent Provides good light and fantastic cooling on high speed No wobble or shake and very quiet- even on high speed We also fitted up a remote for this and it works great also
customer_reviews.author: NYC man

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7200700 Comet Indoor/Outdoor Ceiling Fan with Light, Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso| Size:Indoor/Outdoor| Style:Non-LED| Pattern Name:FanEnjoy spending time outdoors with the cooling comfort provided by the Westinghouse Comet indoor/outdoor ceiling fan. Approved for damp locations, perfect for covered porches and decks, verandahs, and gazebos. Product reference number 72007.
feature_bullets: Transitional 52-inch indoor/outdoor ceiling fan in espresso finish is ideal for large spaces up to 225 square feet (15 feet by 15 feet)
Five weatherproof blades in espresso, light kit with frosted glass includes two 40-watt torpedo candelabra base bulbs
Frosted glass provides soft illumination and contrasts beautifully with the espresso housing
High-quality motor delivers powerful air movement and quiet performance, reverse function for summer/winter operation
Dual mount installation, remote control adaptable, illustrated instruction manual included, Lifetime motor warranty, two-year warranty on all other parts

specifications.Usage: Ceiling Fan, Ceiling Fan with Light
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,071 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
